scratch.title: Automatic Scratch Measurement
scratch.clpError: Error communicating with PLC. Check if it is working

tension.title: Automatic tension value measurement
tension.robotPositioned: Robot positioned. Now put the PLC in manual mode, open the door, turn on the tensiometer, close the door and put the PLC in automatic mode and start the measurement
tension.selectStencil: Select a stencil to perform the measurement.
tension.robotError: Operation error. Could not connect to robot. Try Again
tension.fillFields: Fill in all fields correctly before saving
tension.robotCommunicationProblem: Problem communicating with robot. Suggestion: reset the PLC.
tension.positioningRobot: Positioning robot. Wait, when positioning the robot correctly, you must turn on the tensiometer...
tension.aboutToSave: You are about to save the following values:
tension.reallyWantToSave: Do you really want to save this measurement?
